attributes.additional_details:
Call for government and councils to monitor the road works taking place for quality and timely completion.

To stop allowing contractors to put roadworks in place freely.

To have a licence system in place for the above.

To have a system in place for monitoring the traffic congestion being caused by roadworks.

To reduce the amount of road works that are left in place unnecessarily .

To reduce the amount of road works that are left in place for parking of vans when no work is taking place on the roads.

To make sure subcontractors work effectively ie:having all parts to complete the work not having to wait for weeks for deliverys.

To control and limit road works on main roads that are causing mass delays during rush hours
